channel.title: Marilyn Stathern on Lisa's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Marilyn Stathern on Lisa's Notebook

item.title: Reading Badly; or Goodhart’s Law
item.description: Lockdown has produced in me, as it has in many people, a certain urge to Use the Time for Self-Improvement. This has, amongst other things, included a significant up-swing in the amount of reading I’ve done. I was very much a reader when I was younger, but a combination of parenting a small child, an obligation to read a lot for work, and the ease of screentime, have drastically diminished the amount I read for recreation.
